plays.text: Penalty to Chad Kilger 2 minutes for Interference Kyle Calder

Penalty to Steve Poapst 2 minutes for Hooking SHAUN VAN ALLEN
Goal scored by Steve Sullivan assisted by Boris Mironov and Phil Housley
